problem_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='400' height='50'><text x='10' y='30' font-size='18'>Evaluate Y = 2X² + 3X - 5 when X = 2</text></svg>

steps.svg_prompt: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='350' height='40'><text x='10' y='25' font-size='16'>Y = 2(2)² + 3(2) - 5</text></svg>

answers.explanation_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='250' height='50'><text x='10' y='20'>Correct: You correctly substituted and simplified.</text></svg>
<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='280' height='50'><text x='10' y='20'>Mistake: You squared 2 incorrectly.</text></svg>
<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='280' height='50'><text x='10' y='20'>Mistake: You used wrong value for 3×2.</text></svg>
<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='160' height='40'><text x='10' y='20'>Correct sum is 9.</text></svg>
<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='240' height='40'><text x='10' y='20'>Added incorrectly: 8 + 6 = 14, then -5 = 9.</text></svg>
<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='240' height='40'><text x='10' y='20'>Added without subtracting 5.</text></svg>

final_answer.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='100' height='30'><text x='10' y='20'>Final Answer: 9</text></svg>
final_answer.explanation_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='280' height='50'><text x='10' y='20'>The final result is Y = 9 after full substitution.</text></svg>
